Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2008 12:52PM disnurse wrote: i had dcis grade3 and couldn't get clear margins after 3 lumpectomies, it was on little string not overly large just long and thin.  I felt rushed into having a mastectomy and wanting to be over and done with this.  now that i am done i wish i had a double mastectomy and glad i did at least have the mastectomy afterall
Posts.Title: Multifocal DCIS Mastectomy or no? ShayRN HelenaJ
